name: seng401-project
description: 1. Navigate to the frontend directory:     ```bash     cd frontend     ``` 2. Install dependencies (only needed the first time):    ```bash    npm install    npm install recharts    npm install react-resizable    ``` 3. Start the application:    ```bash    npm run dev    ``` ## **Backend Setup** 1. Navigate to the backend directory:    ```bash    cd backend    ``` 2. Ensure all dependencies are installed:    ```bash    pip install -r requirements.txt # OR     python -m pip install -r requirements.txt    ``` 3. Run the backend server:    ```bash    python app.py    ```
